ComicInfo.Title: Strings - Part 1 of 4
ComicInfo.Summary:
Max, Chloe, and Rachel return in the official Life is Strange comic - continuing the story of the award-winning game from Square Enix and DONTNOD! Acclaimed writers Emma Vieceli and artists Claudia Leonardi and Andrea Izzo bring these beloved heroines to life for a highly anticipated third arc!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Wraparound Cover A | Claudia Leonardi | 1 | B | Cover B (Will Offer) | Game Art | 2 | C | T-Shirt Cover C | ? | 3 | D | Cover D | Roberta Ingranata | 4 | RE | New York Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover | Claudia Leonardi | 5 | RE | Unknown Retailer Exclusive Variant Cover | ? | 6 |
